name: King of the Kobolds
description:
Your dragon, Klauth, has lost his gold to some nasty hobbits, who have scattered it about the land. You, a kobold, must collect as many coins as you can and thwart other kobolds in order to truly become the King of the Kobolds!

How to Play :

W, A, D, or <, ^, > keys to move and jump. Tip: Your head is wider than your body, you can snag your snout on ledges to stay afloat and maximize your jump.
